data.actual_result: Only last two items in dropdown and their descriptions are displayed in correct language
data.expected_result: Keybind related strings should be displayed in the same language as the rest of the app
data.short_description: Most keybind strings and their descriptions don't update after changing in-app language / locale
data.steps_to_repro: - Open User Settings - Go to Keybinds - Add a keybind - Go to Language - Change your in-app language - Go back to Keybinds - Open the left dropdown below "action"
